title: lags
body:
i have got a fast internet and 20ms ping in speedtest.net
youtube never buffers
ps4 online games never lag
but i lag alot in lol why tho?
its been like this since december

replies.body: Your network can still have problems reaching specific servers, and in this case it sounds like our game servers.  That could be caused by how your ISP is routing to us, but more commonly local issues.  I suggest running through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  Let me know if you have any questions!

i have noticed while using youtube it kinda lags
but when i close youtube the game works well
even tho my internet speed is fast

and why the patch gives me  just 150KBps-190KBps
it should be above 700KBps
